creditline: Gift of Suzanne and John Rahn
markings: verso of canvas A, black pigment: MARY HENRY/MENDOCINO/MARCH 22 1968/ON/OFF 10A; verso of canvas B, black pigment: MARY HENRY/MENDOCINO, CALIF/JANUARY 24 1968/ON/OFF No. 10B; Berry Campbell gallery label on back of each canvas
medium: Dayglo acrylic and acrylic on canvas
text: Stand before Mary Dill Henry's painting and let your body be swept into the vibrations that emanate from pulsing color rings. Does it make you dizzy? Or do they calm you, making you feel entranced? Henry tirelessly explored the power of color and patterns to activate the viewer's emotion and if possible, cause physical sensations.
title: On/Off #10a + 10b
